preprocessing.shell.header.title: Requirements preprocessing
preprocessing.shell.sidebar.title: Generating a new model
preprocessing.projectselector.title: Choose a project
preprocessing.projectselector.desc: A project holds your main requirements document that you can then use to generate various diagrams and prototypes. You can reuse the main requirements text and split it up into smaller portions when creating your diagrams and prototypes.
preprocessing.projectselector.table.desc: Start from your existing projects or create a new one.
preprocessing.projectselector.table.head: Project
Description
preprocessing.projectselector.table.body: Select this project for creating a model
preprocessing.projectselector.table.empt: You haven't created any projects yet. Click the blue button to get started.
preprocessing.projectcreator.title: Create a new project
preprocessing.projectcreator.desc: Before we can start generating your models, we need to have access to your requirements. Type or paste them into the box below or upload a plaintext file that we can use from the get-go, or a sound file that we can convert to text.
preprocessing.projectcreator.form.requir: A customer has an id, name, address...
preprocessing.projectcreator.form.file.d: Max file size is 500kb. Only .txt or .wav files are supported.
preprocessing.projectcreator.form.file.h: Drag and drop your file here or click to upload
preprocessing.systemcreator.title: Create new system
preprocessing.systemcreator.desc: Systems are a subset of your requirements document, focused on specific entities that are of interest for modelling purposes, and with a specific type of UML model. Working with systems means that you can compartmentalize your requirements, allowing for incremental development and better intermediate feedback.
preprocessing.extractionreviewer.title: Review extraction
preprocessing.extractionreviewer.desc: With the properties you selected for %CURRENT_SYSTEM%, we have made a subselection of your requirements text for your selected UML models. You can review the subselections and their associated metadata here before we start generating a graphical diagram.
preprocessing.extractionreviewer.info: The UML elements that we identify from your requirements text can be changed in the editor after this step.
